name: lov
description: This is a web reimplementation of the 1992 Legends of Valour game. One of the first sandbox RPGs and one of the first RPGs I played in my old 286. Created by Kevin Bulmer and Ian Downend, I was so impressed that I can say without doubt that this was one of the games that made me interested in computer science.
author: AzazelN28 <asakon28@gmail.com>
